Name: White Stinger
Ingredients: 15 ml Giffard Menthe Pastille white crème de menthe
15 ml Dutch Cacao white crème de cacao
Instructions: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass (preferably over a large cube or chunk of block ice).
Review: A liquid After Eight. Some will prefer to stir, rather than shake this cocktail but it's better to "shake it to wake it."
Nutrition: One serving of White Stinger contains 214 calories
